about_the_game:
THE GRAND FINALE

The Summer Showdown is here. All the training you have (or haven’t) done will be put to the test as you fight for your frat in SVC’s biggest underground fighting tournament. Will you swing your fist like an Ape? Or are the claws coming out like a Wolf?

ON THE ROAD AGAIN

As important as the Summer Showdown is, there’s a lot more to college life than secret underground fighting tournaments. Get ready for some hot adventures south of the border as you and your friends explore Mexico. Between all the sun, sand, sex, and the occasional ancient temple, there will be plenty of memories to make with your favorite girls.

Once you’re back on campus, don’t get too comfortable. You and the gang will be taking a long-awaited trip to Nerd Con! Penelope is taking the next step in publishing her comic book and her friends are coming along for the ride! Embrace your nerdy side with comics, movies and games galore, and who knows? Maybe you’ll even hit it off with a sexy cosplay chick!

COMPLETE YOUR STORY

Throughout your College Kings journey, you’ll have made a lot of important decisions. Which frat did you join? Did you get a girlfriend? Did you betray your frat to Mirken? When the frats needed to unite under one leader, did you step up? All your decisions will finally come to a head in the final episode, and the impact of all your choices will determine how things end for you and for SVC!

You can become a campus legend, but how you’ll be remembered is up to you.

College Kings 2 - Episode 6 “Summer Showdown” requires the base game College Kings 2, and all previous episodes on Steam.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is centred heavily around sexual content. Multiple sex scenes are part of the game's narrative and contain a mixture of stills and animations featuring graphic sexual acts.

There are also some depictions of illegal drug usage, and criminal acts involving the sale of drugs.

name: College Kings 2 - Episode 6 "Summer Showdown"
short_description: The epic conclusion to the AVN series "College Kings 2". All the partying, fighting and sex has led up to this moment as you prove your mettle at the Summer Showdown and try to become a true College King!
